      • warGames

        public boolean warGames(HumanPlayer hum,
                        Player comp)
        In the case of a tie, go to War
        Parameters:
        hum - passes a HumanPlayer in case of tie
        comp - passes a generic Player in case of tie
        Returns:
        boolean to see who the victor of the tie is

      • step

        public void step()

      • getGameState

        public int getGameState()
        Gets the state of the game.
        Returns:
        A negative number if the computer won, 0 if the game is still going on, a positive number if the player won.

      • getStatusMessage

        public String getStatusMessage()

      • getStepGameState

        public War.StepGameState getStepGameState()
        Gets the current state of the stepped game.
        Returns:
        an enum representing the state of the game (Game.StepGameState). Can be normal, cardJustPlayed, gameOver, or war.
